channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 80 years later, a Holocaust survivor meets an American soldier who helped free him
item.description: Andrew Roth survived the Nazi concentration camp Buchenwald. Jack Moran helped liberate the camp while serving in the U.S. Army. Decades after liberat...

item.title: DOJ announces plans to prioritize cases to revoke citizenship
item.description: Denaturalization is a tactic heavily used during the McCarthy era and one that was expanded during the Obama administration and grew further during Pr...

item.title: Click, speak, move: These brain implants are poised to help people with disabilities
item.description: People who can no longer move or speak may soon have a new option: an implanted device that links their brain to a computer.

item.title: This company wants to be the first to mine the ocean floor, with Trump's help
item.description: The Metals Company is applying for permission from the Trump administration to mine for nickel and cobalt beneath a remote patch of the Pacific Ocean....

item.title: In effort to protect children, France bans smoking at parks and beaches
item.description: Smokers are no longer allowed to light up in public parks, at swimming pools, or at beaches, or "anywhere children may be present," said French health...

item.title: Watch: Humanoid robots stumble through football match in China
item.description: The robots kicked, scored and tumbled while competing at a tourmentant in Beijing.

item.title: To help party brand, Democrats prepare "Organizing Summer"
item.description: Democrats found themselves locked out of power in Washington after the 2024 presidential election. Now campaign groups are readying an effort to help ...

item.title: Suspect arrested in livestreamed murder of TikTok influencer
item.description: Jesus Sarmiento was broadcasting live when armed men entered the residence where he was staying and shot him.

item.title: Hundreds of families displaced by wave of Israeli air strikes on Gaza, witnesses say
item.description: At least five people were reported killed in the overnight attacks, as fears of an intensified ground offensive grow.

item.title: Canada PM says trade talks with U.S. resuming
item.description: Canadian Prime Minister Carney says U.S.-Canada trade talks are resuming Canada rescinded its plan to tax U.S. technology firms, a plan President Trum...

item.title: A violent ambush in Idaho leaves 2 firefighters dead and 1 injured. What to know about the attack
Prada acknowledges footwear design's Indian roots after backlash
item.description: Prada described the Kolhapuri sandals as "leather footwear" but did not mention its origins, prompting backlash.

item.title: 2 firefighters killed in ambush in Idaho, shot at while responding to wildfire
item.description: Two firefighters were shot dead and a third wounded on an Idaho mountain when they were ambushed by a man who set the fire to lure them to the area, t...

item.title: I lost half my weight in jail, but I'm not broken, says freed Belarus opposition leader
item.description: Sergei Tikhanovsky was kept isolated in bare, tiny cells and tells the BBC that Belarus must free other political prisoners.

item.title: HHS cuts CDC staff who made sure birth control is safe for women at risk
item.description: The Trump administration eliminated the CDC team that developed national guidelines for prescribing contraception safely for millions of women with un...

item.title: Two firefighters shot dead in Idaho ambush, police say
item.description: The suspect has been found dead after the firefighters were killed with a high-powered weapon, authorities say.
